forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 64F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 61F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 45F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 52F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 11C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 4C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 40F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 39F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 3C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
